critique: This document is an executive order delegating the authority to promulgate regulations regarding section 5520a of title 5, United States Code. This section likely pertains to some aspect of federal employment, but without knowing the specifics, it's difficult to assess the ideological tilt or impact on various axes. The order itself simply assigns responsibility to the Office of Personnel Management and the Postmaster General. Therefore, most scores should be neutral. There's no indication of immigration policy, executive power expansion, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation changes, or social inclusion aspects.
